## Load packages
```{r eval=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(assertr)
```


## Import data

```{r warning=FALSE}
H1B18<-read_csv(unzip("data/h1b18.csv.zip")) %>% 
  clean_names()
file.remove("h1b18.csv")
```
